body.name: Intel® Core™ i7-11700 Desktop Processor 8 Cores up to 4.9 GHz LGA1200 (Intel® 500 Series & Select 400 Series Chipset) 65W
features: Intel® Core® i7 processor offers more cache space and the hyper-threading architecture delivers high performance for demanding applications with better onboard graphics and faster turbo boost
The processor features Socket LGA-1200 socket for installation on the PCB
Its 16 MB of L3 cache is good enough to carry routine data and process them in a flash giving you fast and smooth performance
14 nm enables improved performance per watt and micro architecture makes it power-efficient
To boost graphics and visual quality, the chipset has a built in Intel UHD Graphics 750 controller
body.description: 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11700 desktop processor. Featuring Intel Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0 and PCIe Gen 4.0 support. Built for the everyday desktop user; this processor delivers amazing performance for everything from enthusiast gaming and creation to productivity Thermal solution included in the box. Compatible with 500 series & select 400 series chipset based motherboards. Refer to motherboard vendor for compatibility details. 65W.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Think outside the box. 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11700 desktop processor

i7-11700 Desktop Boxed CPU Specs Max clock speed Up to 4.9 GHz Base clock speed 2.5 GHz Cores/Threads 8/16 Unlocked and overclockable(1) No Boost technology Intel Turbo Boost Technology 3.0 TDP 65W Intel Smart Cache 16M Motherboard compatibility 400 and 500 series(2)

Engineered for play. Intel’s latest desktop processor architecture and fast clock speeds deliver high frame rates and low latency for competitive play and more immersive experiences. Made to create. Along with the power to push through complex creative projects, 11th Gen Intel Core processors feature intelligent performance to assist your workflow in optimized applications. Game for a crowd. The efficient multi-threaded performance of the 11thGen Intel Core processors allow you to maximize your streaming quality and maintain high FPS while gaming. Engineered for play. Made to create. Game for a crowd.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Make shure you order the correct cpu. Many different flavors. Worked perfectly. Great packaging. Even came with a fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used CPU arrived as expected but with a NEW Intel cooling fan! Best Used Price by far.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this i7-11700 CPU because it was being sold at the lowest price. Somehow, it was not immediately clear that the CPU was used. I had wanted a new, unlocked version of the same CPU at a price increase of $80. Frustrated that Amazon is pushing used products on us along with new, I decided to return the CPU and order a new one. There was no problem returning the used CPU. After I had it boxed, labeled and ready to return, I found an $70, used, z590 motherboard. I kept the used CPU, installed it into my used z590 and I was able to upgrade one of my i7 6900 systems for less than $300. After comparing this with other identical used CPU's, this turned out to be a bargain especially because it came with New Intel CPU fan which will be great for testing. Glad I kept it. It arrived quickly and packaged well. I used the new CPU and motherboard that I ordered in another i7-68000 system upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding CPU for gaming
reviews.reviewText: It will run all 1000 mainstream games at high settings long as youhavea solid GPU. If installed personally you will have to run command prompt. Type sfc /scannow to fix registry errors. This will fix all issues with the registry log.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gaming processor teamed with Z590-A chipset
reviews.reviewText: I just taught a 15 yr. old grandson how to build, and maintain his own computer. I chose a new MSI Z590-A motherboard, 32 gig of high speed gaming RAM, (DDR4 3200) and topped it off with this new 11th gen processor. Fired right up when he hit the switch! Grandson is proud of his work!I do recommend using the built-in graphics (UHD 750) in lieu of a stand alone Nvidia RTX card, due to availability, and a steep price point! Good cards are unavailable right now due to the worldwide chip shortage, which makes the price of RTX cards waaay too high. Wait till the costs come down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I7 the best
reviews.reviewText: Installed easily. Used third party fan/cooler. Works great. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves me well
reviews.reviewText: This serves me well because I wanted a powerful CPU with less power consumption

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great under $200 last generation CPU.
reviews.reviewText: I knew going in it was not the latest CPU out there and I was looking for at least 8 cores with a low TDP to do a mini ITX build. Paired it with the MSI MPG B560i. I have no complaints with this CPU. Temps are great using a EK Basic 240 mm AIO. (32 idle and 82 under load ) Catch it on sale and you won't be disappointed if your doing a budget build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good cpu but there is something missing
reviews.reviewText: The one thing that is missing is the letter at the end of the model number. It's my fault i wasn't paying close enough attention but i wanted to over clock this cpu. And for the price i should be able to. 10th gen was better anyway.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a real chip everything is working great
reviews.reviewText: We're do I start it's one of the best chips I could ask for I updated from a 11400f 11th Gen processor was leggy and buggy and frame rate was starting too make me made it has changed my esports games by a long shot here even did a userbench mark test and it all came out too ufo status there so happy I replaced all my components except the mother board will be at a later date with a chip thank you Amazon for the best deal on this site

reviews.reviewTitle: Este procesador funciona perfectamente a mis necesidades de edición...
reviews.reviewText: Instalado en una tarjeta madre ASUS microATX TUF GAMING B560M-PLUS WIFI y me fuciona perfectamente, uso mi equipo básicamente para edición de video y fotografía y en conjunto con 64M de RAM y disco SSD NVME PCI 4.0 (Samsung 980 pro) los renderizados son muy rápidos y todo el software de edicion de videos y revelado de fotografias trabaja increíble, por lo consiguiente todo lo demás igual.

I used this chip to upgrade my wife's i5 10400f ITX build. Paired with an NZXT H1 v2 and the included 120ml AIO it maintains a constant boost clock of 4.10-4.20ghz. the extra 2 cores and 4 threads also helps when she's doing some editing work. It also scales up nicely to an RTX 3070.
Funciono de maravilla se siente un gran cambio claro si se le compara con el i5-6400 que tenia, llego en el tiempo que amazon indica sin problema.
